Articles.Content:
Have you seen any odd names for the poor, defenseless (except for their explody boosters), stupid kerbals going (well, trying) to go to space?

I have one in the attachments. 

 Danger Kerman

Odd, eh? And Danger even looks scared.

Another one.

Rayfry Kerman.
Mackables kerman. i think it sounds funny. Lars kerman. luke\'s uncle is flying rockets!

I\'m hoping to see a Bernard Kerman. Then I can place all the blame on him.

(anyone who\'s been around Silent Hunter 3 would know what I\'m talking about)

I have another one, named Bobfurt Kerman.

He seems very scared...

EDIT: He\'s been scared the whole mission.
oxburf kerman
You should lookup the Munwig and Friends thread by Nova.

You should lookup the Munwig and Friends thread by Nova.

...

...

...

That was awesome and ridiculously funny.

MUNWIG AND FRIENDS
I want a munwig too.
I have Mitsey Kerman. And Kirk Kerman.
While the names aren\'t unusual at all, I\'ve got Rick Kerman sitting next to Ashley Kerman.

Probably for the best. After all, we know then that Rick\'s never gonna give her up, never gonna let her down...

You, sir, have been rickrolled by KSP.
Once I had Newble Kerman.
Merman Kerman ;D

Oh man, I hope there isn\'t an Ethel Kerman.

*There\'s NO business like SHOW business...*

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky
I know there\'s a Stephen Kerman (my name)
I once got a Wily-Bobwise Kerman. xD

Off topic, do you think this will work for a Mun mission (my first)?

I\'m just lucky it didn\'t go too fast to orbit Kerbol. I also have about 1/4 of a fuel tank left for landing.
Has anyone else had the thought that maybe all these generic Kerbals should be wearing red uniforms?

Off topic, do you think this will work for a Mun mission (my first)?

I\'m just lucky it didn\'t go too fast to orbit Kerbol. I also have about 1/4 of a fuel tank left for landing.

I time warped and the Mun kept whipping me somewhere and then Kerbin catches me back into orbit.

Has anyone else had the thought that maybe all these generic Kerbals should be wearing red uniforms?

yes. that way the new recruits don\'t notice the blood stain on their 'brand new' space suits.

yes. that way the new recruits don\'t notice the blood stain on their 'brand new' space suits.

We\'re supposed to believe they recover the old crafts and crew?

if they die on launch, which is where we all kill our crews in rocket design testing, or just cuz its fun, and if they die on re-entry or landing. I personal land landers on the mun as close to failed missions as possible to observe the wreckage.
Poor ensign Rickey... Well I hope ensign George doesnt notice the blood stains.
I just got a Billy-Bobbert Kerman.
